comment.shortText:
Run's an effect on mount, and is cleaned up on unmount. Generally
useful for interop with non-react plugins or components

comment.text: An effect to run on mount

mdx.rawBody: An effect to run on mount

markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: An effect to run on mount

markdownRemark.html:
Run's an effect on mount, and is cleaned up on unmount. Generally useful for interop with non-react plugins or components

 useMountEffect(() => {
   const plugin = $.myPlugin(ref.current)

   return () => {
     plugin.destroy()
   }
 })

tags.name: param
tags.value: An effect to run on mount
